Question
========

The following repeated measures model is given: $X_{ij} = \mu+\pi_{i}+\tau_{j}+e_{ij}^{*}$. The overall mean is 52. Subject 1 scores across repeated measurements 55. The mean score at time 1 across persons is 48. The residual for person 1 at time 1 is -1.

Calculate person 1's score at time 1 ($X_{11}$). 
Answerlist
----------
* 50
* 51
* 52
* 54

Solution
========

* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
